did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Minutes of church meetings (1799-1896); session meetings (1827-1896); ecclesiastical councils (1799-1896); and Congregational Society meetings (1839-1883). Also included are Articles of Faith and Covenants for 1799, 1812, 1828, 1858, 1884; lists of baptisms (1799-1896); marriages (1799-1829); deaths (1800-1896) and membership information.

controlaccess.head: Places:
controlaccess.geogname: Ontario County (N.Y.) -- Religious life and customs.
